interpretation: The "speak-no-evil monkey" emoji represents the concept of keeping secrets or staying quiet in certain situations. This card may indicate a need for discretion or a warning to avoid gossip or speaking out of turn. It can also symbolize a fear of speaking up or expressing oneself, and suggest a need to overcome shyness or insecurity. Alternatively, this card may represent a situation where silence is golden, and caution is advised before revealing too much information or getting involved in a sensitive matter. The "speak-no-evil monkey" reminds us to be mindful of our words and actions, and to consider the consequences of our communication. Keywords associated with this card include discretion, secrecy, caution, inhibition, and prudence.
